index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and providing for the implementation of the Third Year Community Development Block Grant Program commencing on July 1, 1977; establishing certain positions in the Building Department, increasing expenditure allowances for certain objects of expenditure in the 1977 Budget of said department, and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the Emergency therefor.
